[http://web.archive.org/web/20011104031757/http://netgear.com/product_view.asp?xrp=11&yrp=31&zrp=102 Product page (via archive.org)]
{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WE102|vs_id=2553}} This device uses a '''ShareWave''' Cresta II radio module. [http://www.amazon.com/Netgear-Multimedia-Wireless-Ethernet-Bridge/dp/B00005NOKW On Amazon] ==Images== File:Netgear WE102 1.jpg|front File:Netgear WE102 2.jpg|back [[Has images::external| ]]
